p: Starter (1 to 21 D) and finisher (22 to 40 D) diets were the same for all treatments and were formulated according to NRC ( 1994) and as used by Silva-Vázquez et al. ( 2015, 2018) and Méndez-Zamora et al. ( 2017). Likewise, husbandry practices were applied according to these authors. Feed and water were provided ad libitum throughout the experiment.
